feesText.default: These fees includes all homeopathic remedies and postage within UK.  If you are outside the UK, I will provide details to a homeopathic pharmacy where you can purchase remedies online.  ​  If you are unable to make your appointment, please give at least 48 hours notice otherwise a fee will be incurred.  ​  Payment for consultations is required at the time of booking your appointment.

newClients.default: Initial consultation - New clients only (up to 75 mins)
